name: Judgement Arena
description:
In a post-apocalyptic society, criminals are pitted against each other in a combat arena. The results are the judgement.

Grab your guns, grab your controllers, and grab your butts in this no holes barred raycasted shooter with over twenty different maps!

Judgement Arena is a simple 2-4 player clay shooter game.

Try the demo today!

The android version is for OUYA, but may work on other android consoles.

Note: This game is controller based. It requires at least one controller other than the keyboard and mouse.

Supported controllers:

  • OUYA Controller
  • XBOX 360 Controller (Wired & Dongle)
  • PS3 Dualshock Controller
  • Logitech F310
  • Amazon Fire Game Controller

This game was made by @josefnpat for the January 2015 OneGameAMonth challenge.

For any questions, comments, bugs or feature requests, please visit the official GitHub repository here, or contact me at seppi@missingsentinelsoftware.com.
